title: Match Inventory Tool
description: Matches an owned item to a foodbank entry and logs or processes the match. A match is considered anything that is likely compatible, the names or brands do not have to match exactly, just the general type of food item.

itemOwned.description: The name of the item currently in the user's inventory.

foodbankMatch.description: The EXACT name of the item that the foodbank needs which matches an item from the user's inventory.

foodbankName.description: The EXACT name of the foodbank where the match was found.
